## relationships.Api interface

Entry point for relationships to Smokeball.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface Api 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [add(request)](./smokeball-client-sdk.relationships.api.add.md) | Adds a new relationship to a role with the specified contact id to the current context and returns the relationship. |
|  [get(roleId)](./smokeball-client-sdk.relationships.api.get.md) | Gets the relationships of a role for the current context. |
|  [remove(roleId, id)](./smokeball-client-sdk.relationships.api.remove.md) | Removes the specified relationship from a role for the current context. Returns the remaining relationships for that role. |
|  [update(request)](./smokeball-client-sdk.relationships.api.update.md) | Updates the relationship associated to the specified role id and returns the relationship. |
